timeline.title: Retail Foundation
timeline.description: Started in retail, building the foundation of customer service, communication, and understanding people that would inform everything that came after.

timeline.title: Serenergy Founded
timeline.description: Launched a nootropic energy shot company at age 21. Caffeine + L-Theanine formula, 'serene energy' branding. Built everything solo: product, brand, sales, distribution.

timeline.title: Television & Growth
timeline.description: Appeared on local television twice. Sold thousands of units through direct sales. Got to VitaminShoppe buyer meetings for potential national distribution.

timeline.title: The Pivot
timeline.description: Pilotworks (commercial kitchen partner) shut down unexpectedly, collapsing supply chain. Made the hard decision to pivot to IT. Started self-teaching—no bootcamp, no CS degree.

timeline.title: VitaminShoppe IT
timeline.description: First IT role as Service Desk Analyst. Remote position supporting 5,000+ users across corporate and retail. Learned enterprise IT from the ground up.

timeline.title: AI Early Adopter
timeline.description: Gained access to ChatGPT API and playground in August 2022—three months before the public launch. Top 0.1% of early users (verified by ChatGPT Wrapped). Started building with LLMs immediately.

timeline.title: AWS Certified
timeline.description: Earned AWS Solutions Architect Associate certification. Completed Cloud Resume Challenge. Continued deepening technical expertise across cloud and automation.

timeline.title: System Admin + Aelorians
timeline.description: Promoted to System Administrator at TransCore. Started building Aelorians AI companion platform. Invested in RTX 5090 for local model fine-tuning.

timeline.title: What's Next?
timeline.description: Looking for the right opportunity to bring together entrepreneurial grit, technical depth, and genuine passion for building things that help people.
